description_html:
Sailor and Lula are deeply in love, but Lula's mom Marietta doesn't approve of the relationship. They seek to get away but trouble finds them.

Written and Directed by David Lynch, Wild at Heart adds a bit of surrealism — inspired by The Wizard of Oz — to Sailor and Lula's illicit romance.
story_html:
Look for a story about Sailor and Lula coming soon to ArtsyVisions.com.

To when there is new content on our sites, subscribe to the Artsy Visions Monthly Newsletter!!
affiliate_ad_html:
Get the DVD!

Wild at Heart is a great film, and we highly recommend watching it.

image_list.title: Sailor Ripley
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Sailor's spiritual portrait shows he is passionate and very open to new experiences and ideas.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Red in this spiritual portrait represents Sailor's dominant personality trait, his passion and warmth.  In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.  He demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_aux: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents Sailor's auxiliary personality trait, his realistic outlook and openness to new experiences.  In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a vertical line to represent this, because it is more evident than the dominant function.  He demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....

image_list.title: Lula Fortune
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Lula's spiritual portrait shows she is passionate and very open to new experiences and ideas.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents Lula's dominant personality trait, her openness to experiences.  In Extraverts, the dominant trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long vertical line to represent this, because it is the side of their personality that is most evident.  She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_aux: The Red in this spiritual portrait represents Lula's auxiliary personality trait, her strong tendency to be passionate.  In Extraverts, the auxiliary trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a horizontal line to represent this.  She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
